  • Method Details

    • printBoard

      void printBoard​(java.lang.String board)
      This method will only print the board These are the ascii (from #48 to #67) value in the string provided as parameter
      Parameters:
      board - the 25 characters represents every position of the board as declared previously

    • moveChoice

      int moveChoice​(java.util.List<int[]>[] moves, int[][] positionsWorkers)
      This method will return number associated to the move selected
      Parameters:
      moves - is the array of lists of possible moves calculated from the server
      positionsWorkers - is the position of both workers of the player
      Returns:
      the number associated to the move selected

    • buildChoice

      int buildChoice​(java.util.List<int[]> moves)
      This method will return number associated to the built selected
      Parameters:
      moves - is the list of possible built calculated from the server
      Returns:
      the number associated to the built selected

    • ipPortChoices

      java.lang.String[] ipPortChoices()
      This method will return an array of strings with ip and port
      Returns:
      ip in 0 position and port in 1 position

    • nicknameBirthdayChoice

      java.lang.String[] nicknameBirthdayChoice()
      This method will return an array of strings with nickname and birthday
      Returns:
      nickname in position 0 and birthday in position 1

    • cardChoices

      GlobalVariables.DivinityCard[] cardChoices​(int playerNumber)
      This method will select n divinity cards in order to be selected by all players
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - is the number of players in game
      Returns:
      array of n (= player number) divinity cards

    • divinitySelection

      GlobalVariables.DivinityCard divinitySelection​(GlobalVariables.DivinityCard[] cards)
      This method will select a card through all cards provided by parameters
      Parameters:
      cards - is the cards selected by the first player
      Returns:
      a card selected by the player

    • firstSetWorkers

      int[][] firstSetWorkers​(java.util.List<int[]> impossiblePositions)
      This method will select the first positions of the workers
      Parameters:
      impossiblePositions - is the positions already taken by other players
      Returns:
      the positions selected for workers

    • specialChoices

      boolean specialChoices​(java.lang.String string)
      This method will return an answer (true or false) for a question provided
      Parameters:
      string - is the question asked to the player
      Returns:
      true or false based on the answer

    • numberOfPlayers

      int numberOfPlayers()
      This method will return the number of player in order to create a new game
      Returns:
      2 or 3

    • alert

      void alert​(java.lang.String string)
      This method will print a message
      Parameters:
      string - is the message that has to be displayed

    • status

      void status​(int[] divinityCards, int turnNumber)
      This method will update the infos of the game
      Parameters:
      divinityCards - are the divinity card of all players
      turnNumber - is your turn number
